name: cashflow
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool holistic_finance_stock_data.
Tool description: Provides stock data based on multiple sources such as Yahoo Finance.
API description: Provides either annual or quarterly cash flow statements of an single stock company.

symbol.description: The stock symbol of the company (e.g., 'AAPL' for Apple Inc.).

period.description: The reporting period for the cash flow statement. Typically 'annual' or 'quarterly'.
